Class PetType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.maxwellwheeler.plugins.tppets.storage.PetType

  • public class PetType
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that classifies entities by the types we care about, CAT, DOG, and PARROT

      • getEnumByEntity

        public static PetType.Pets getEnumByEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Entity ent)
        Gets the enum PetType.Pets based on the entity's type.
        Parameters:
        ent - The entity to be checked
        Returns:
        The enum value representing the entity's type

      • getIndexFromPet

        public static int getIndexFromPet(PetType.Pets pt)
        Gets a numeric index based on the pet type, used in the database storage of the pet. While MySQL supports enums directly, SQLite does not, so this plugin uses integers to store this data.
        Parameters:
        pt - The type of the pet
        Returns:
        An integer representing the enum passed as pt

      • getPetFromIndex

        public static PetType.Pets getPetFromIndex(int i)
        Gets the PetType.Pets enum value from the integer, used when pulling pets from database storage.
        Parameters:
        i - The index of the pet, consistent with the getIndexFromPet(Pets pt) method.
        Returns:
        The pet's type

      • getClassTranslate

        public static java.lang.Class<?>[] getClassTranslate(PetType.Pets pt)
        Returns a reference to the class type of the pet, primarily for the world.getEntitiesByClasses-type methods.
        Parameters:
        pt - The type of pets to get the class reference of
        Returns:
        A reference to the class
